explanation: [0-0] A hand is holding a blue stamp and stamping it onto a white piece of paper. The stamp is square-shaped with cartoon patterns and the Chinese characters "好好学习" (study hard) on it. There is a column of addition problems on the left side of the paper.

[0-7] Then she drags the blue stamp from the top to the bottom in the middle of the white paper, revealing a column of addition problems along its path. Afterward, she picks up a pink stamp, also square-shaped with cartoon patterns printed on it. She drags the pink stamp on the right side of the white paper, making a column of subtraction problems appear. Using the same method, she stamps three more columns of addition and subtraction problems on the blank white paper.
